curam.util.type
Class CodeTable

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.type.CodeTable

public abstract class CodeTable
extends java.lang.Object

Retrieve code table translations. Most applications make heavy use of "codes" -- compact representations of more verbose descriptions. A Curam code is a string of maximum length 10 characters, which is associated with a description which is also represented as a string. Related codes are grouped into "code tables". A code table is identified by a code table name, which is a string. Applications sometimes need to provide default values for fields which are stored as code representations. Each Curam code table can have a "default code", which is the default item from that table.

Method Detail

addCodeTableItem

public static void addCodeTableItem(java.lang.String table,
                                    java.lang.String code,
                                    java.lang.String description,
                                    java.lang.String annotation,
                                    boolean isEnabled,
                                    int sortOrder,
                                    java.lang.String locale)
                             throws AppException,
                                    DatabaseException,
                                    InformationalException
Add a code table item to the database. This method operates on the database rather than the cache.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be inserted.
code - The value of the code within the table to be inserted.
description - The description of the code to be inserted.
annotation - The annotation details to be inserted.
isEnabled - Enabled flag to be inserted.
sortOrder - The presentation order for the item.
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Throws:
AppException - ID_ADDITEM_NOTABLE - the specified code table does not exist.
AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DUPREC - a code with the same name already exists on the specified table.
AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY - the new description is empty.
AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DESCRIPTIONDUPREC - the new description is duplicate to an existing description.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

modifyCodeTableItem

public static void modifyCodeTableItem(java.lang.String table,
                                       java.lang.String code,
                                       java.lang.String description,
                                       java.lang.String annotation,
                                       boolean isEnabled,
                                       int sortOrder,
                                       java.lang.String locale)
                                throws AppException,
                                       DatabaseException,
                                       InformationalException
Calls the overloaded modifyCodeTableItem, to change the details associated with a code table item, passing a default value of 1 for the version number used as part of the optimistic locking mechanism.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table.
code - The value of the code within the table.
description - The description of the code.
annotation - The annotation.
isEnabled - Enabled flag.
sortOrder - The presentation order for the item.
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Throws:
AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_RECNOTFOUND - the specified code does not exist on the specified table.
AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_TABLENOTFOUND - the specified table does not exist.
AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CHANGE_ITEM_CODE_EMPTY - the new code is empty.
AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CHANGE_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY - the new description is empty.
AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_DUPREC - the specified code already exists on the table.
AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_DESCRIPTIONDUPREC - the new description is duplicate to an existing description.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
See Also:
(String, String, String, String, boolean, int, String, int)

                                       java.lang.String code,
                                       java.lang.String description,
                                       java.lang.String annotation,
                                       boolean isEnabled,
                                       int sortOrder,
                                       java.lang.String locale,
                                       int versionNo)
                                throws AppException,
                                       DatabaseException,
                                       InformationalException
Change the details associated with a code table item on the database. This method operates on the database rather than the cache.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table.
code - The value of the code within the table.
description - The description of the code.
annotation - The annotation.
isEnabled - Enabled flag.
sortOrder - The presentation order for the item.
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
versionNo - The version number for the optimistic locking mechanism.
Throws:
AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_RECNOTFOUND - the specified code does not exist on the specified table.
AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_TABLENOTFOUND - the specified table does not exist.
AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CHANGE_ITEM_CODE_EMPTY - the new code is empty.
AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CHANGE_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY - the new description is empty.
AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_DUPREC - the specified code already exists on the table.
AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_DESCRIPTIONDUPREC - the new description is duplicate to an existing description.

deleteCodeTableItem

public static void deleteCodeTableItem(java.lang.String table,
                                       java.lang.String code,
                                       java.lang.String locale)
                                throws AppException,
                                       DatabaseException,
                                       InformationalException
Delete a code from the code table. The default code is set to empty if this code is the default code. This method operates on the database rather than the cache.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table.
code - The value of the code within the table.
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Throws:
AppException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - the specified code table does not exist.
AppException - ID_DELITEM_NOTFOUND - the specified code does not exist on the specified table.
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getOneItem

public static java.lang.String getOneItem(java.lang.String table,
                                          java.lang.String code,
                                          java.lang.String locale)
                                   throws AppException,
                                          DatabaseException,
                                          AppRuntimeException,
                                          InformationalException
Get the description associated with a code. This is based on the contents of the cache, but if the code table is not present in the cache the individual code table is synchronized with the database.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up
code - The value of the code within the table to be looked up
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Returns:
The description associated with the code if the code is found in the specified code table, otherwise an empty string is returned.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

isEnabled

public static boolean isEnabled(java.lang.String table,
                                java.lang.String code,
                                java.lang.String locale)
                         throws AppException,
                                DatabaseException,
                                AppRuntimeException,
                                InformationalException
Get the isEnabled flag associated with a code. This is based on the contents of the cache, but if the code table is not present in the cache the individual code table is synchronized with the database.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up.
code - The name of the code to be looked up.
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Returns:
Indicates whether the item is enabled. If a code table item is not enabled it will not be displayed in the client by default. A non-existent code will be reported as not being enabled.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                            java.lang.String code,
                            java.lang.String locale)
                     throws AppException,
                            DatabaseException,
                            AppRuntimeException,
                            InformationalException
Get the sort order associated with a code. This is based on the contents of the cache, but if the code table is not present in the cache the individual code table is synchronized with the database.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up.
code - The name of the code to be looked up.
locale - The code representing the country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Returns:
The sort order. 0 if the code does not exist.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.

Returns:
The name of the child code table in the hierarchy or null.

getParentCode

public static java.lang.String getParentCode(java.lang.String table,
                                             java.lang.String code)
                                      throws AppException,
                                             DatabaseException,
                                             AppRuntimeException,
                                             InformationalException
Get the parent code value of the specified code in the specified code table. If the code is not in a hierarchy (or not linked) null will be returned. The parent code indicates the code in the parent code table to which the specified code is linked in the hierarchy.

Parameters:
table - The code table name.
code - The code value.
Returns:
The parent code in the hierarchy or null.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                           throws AppException,
                                  DatabaseException,
                                  AppRuntimeException,
                                  InformationalException
Return true if the specified code table is part of a hierarchy.

Parameters:
table - The code table name.
Returns:
Boolean indicating if the code table is part of a hierarchy.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

getAllCodes

public static java.lang.String[] getAllCodes(java.lang.String table,
                                             java.lang.String locale)
                                      throws AppException,
                                             DatabaseException,
                                             AppRuntimeException,
                                             InformationalException
Get all the codes associated with a code table. This is based on the contents of the cache, but if the code table is not present in the cache the individual code table is synchronized with the database.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Returns:
An array of codes associated with the code table.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getAllCodesStringList

public static StringList getAllCodesStringList(java.lang.String table,
                                               java.lang.String locale)
                                        throws AppException,
                                               DatabaseException,
                                               AppRuntimeException,
                                               InformationalException
Same as getAllCodes(String,String), but the result is a StringList instead of an array.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up.
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Returns:
An array of codes associated with the code table if the code table is present, otherwise null.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getDistinctCodesForAllLanguages

public static StringList getDistinctCodesForAllLanguages(java.lang.String table)
                                                  throws AppException,
                                                         AppRuntimeException,
                                                         InformationalException
Get all of the codes for which are associated with a code table. A code table may have different codes associated with each locale even though a code itself cannot differ over locales.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up.
Returns:
An array of codes associated with the code table.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getNumberOfDistinctCodes

public static int getNumberOfDistinctCodes(java.lang.String table)
                                    throws AppException,
                                           AppRuntimeException,
                                           InformationalException
Get the number of distinct codes that are associated with a code table. A code table may have different codes associated with each language even though a code itself cannot differ over languages.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up.
Returns:
The number of distinct codes associated with the code table.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getOneItem

public static java.lang.String getOneItem(java.lang.String table,
                                          java.lang.String code)
                                   throws AppException,
                                          DatabaseException,
                                          AppRuntimeException,
                                          InformationalException
Get the description associated with a code in the locale of the logged in user. If the logged in users locale cannot be determined, the fall back locale of en will be used. The description is retrieved from the cache, but if the code table is not present in the cache the individual code table is synchronized with the database.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up
code - The value of the code within the table to be looked up
Returns:
The description associated with the code if the code is found in the specified code table, otherwise an empty string is returned.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
See Also:
CodeTable.getOneItem(String,String,String)

getOneItemForUserLocale

public static java.lang.String getOneItemForUserLocale(java.lang.String table,
                                                       java.lang.String code)
                                                throws AppException,
                                                       DatabaseException,
                                                       AppRuntimeException,
                                                       InformationalException
Get the description associated with a code in the locale of the current transaction or locale of the logged in user. If the requested or user locale is null, null will be returned. The description is retrieved from the contents of the cache, but if the code table is not present in the cache the individual code table is synchronized with the database.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up
code - The value of the code within the table to be looked up
Returns:
The description associated with the code if the code is found in the specified code table, otherwise an empty string is returned.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
See Also:
CodeTable.getOneItem(String,String,String)

getAllItems

public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllItems(java.lang.String table,
                                                                                     java.lang.String locale)
                                                                              throws AppException,
                                                                                     DatabaseException,
                                                                                     AppRuntimeException,
                                                                                     InformationalException
Get all the codes and description associated with a code table. This is based on the contents of the cache, but if the code table is not present in the cache the individual code table is synchronized with the database.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Returns:
A map which contains the codes and descriptions, as the key value pair for the specified code table in a given locale.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                                                                                            DatabaseException,
                                                                                            AppRuntimeException,
                                                                                            InformationalException
Get all the enabled codes and description associated with a code table. This is based on the contents of the cache, but if the code table is not present in the cache the individual code table is synchronized with the database.

Parameters:
table - The name of the code table to be looked up
locale - The country/language associated with the item. This code is based on the ISO-639 and ISO-3166 standards and must be 2 or 5 characters long.
Returns:
A map which contains all the enabled codes and descriptions, as the key value pair for the specified code table in a given locale.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
AppRuntimeException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if the specified code table does not exist.
